scripts.build: babel 17-Book.js 17-ITBook.js 17-Ebook.js 18-Library.js 19-ApiService.js --out-dir lib && cd lib && cp 17-Book.js 17-Book.cjs && cp 17-ITBook.js 17-ITBook.cjs && cp 17-Ebook.js 17-Ebook.cjs && cp 18-Library.js 18-Library.cjs && cp 19-ApiService.js 19-ApiService.cjs
scripts.start: npm run build && node -e "const Book = require('./lib/17-Book.cjs').default; const b1 = new Book('Pequeno', 100); b1.pages = -50; console.log('Páginas de b1:', b1.pages);"
scripts.test-it: npm run build && node -e "const ITBook = require('./lib/17-ITBook.cjs').default; const it = new ITBook('React', 300, 'Web'); it.printTitle(); console.log('Páginas:', it.pages);"
scripts.test-cap2: npm run build && node -e "const Library = require('./lib/18-Library.cjs').default; const ITBook = require('./lib/17-ITBook.cjs').default; const lib = new Library(); lib.addBook(new ITBook('React', 300, 'Web')); lib.addBook(new ITBook('Node', 450, 'Backend')); lib.addBook(new ITBook('Python', 150, 'Data Science')); console.log('\nInventário:', lib.getInventory()); console.log('Total de páginas no acervo:', lib.calculateTotalPages());"
scripts.test-cap3: npm run build && node -e "const Api = require('./lib/19-ApiService.cjs').default; async function run() { console.log('--- INÍCIO DA REQUISIÇÃO ---'); try { const data = await Api.fetchBookData('JavaScript Moderno'); console.log('Dados Recebidos:', data); } catch (err) { console.error(err); } console.log('--- FIM (O código não travou!) ---'); } run();"
